channel.title: Cybersecurity News Aggregator
channel.description: Latest cybersecurity news from top sources
channel.comment: News aggregated from: Krebs on Security, The Hacker News, Threatpost, Bleeping Computer, Dark Reading

item.title: ChatGPT is losing market share as Google Gemini gains ground
item.description: New data suggests that ChatGPT is losing its market share to Gemini on the web. It's unclear if Gemini is also gaining ground in the mobile space. [...]...
item.dc:creator: Bleeping Computer

item.title: Logitech Options+, G HUB macOS apps break after certificate expires
item.description: Logitech's Options+ and G Hub apps on macOS stopped working after their code-signing certificate expired, leaving users unable to launch them on Apple systems. [...]...

item.title: Max severity Ni8mare flaw lets hackers hijack n8n servers
item.description: A maximum severity vulnerability dubbed "Ni8mare" allows remote, unauthenticated attackers to take control over locally deployed instances of the N8N workflow automation platform. [...]...
